geo.zip.zipToCoord(zipCode)

take zip code and convert them to a the coordinates :param zipCode: `>>>zipToCoord(29483) :return: `>>>{“City”: “Summerville”, “Density”: 493.2076866223208, “HouseOfUnits”: 26575, “LandArea”: 135.3, “Latitude”: 33.0752648, “Longitude”: -80.20982190000001, “NEBoundLatitude”: 33.2421799, “NEBoundLongitude”: -80.06345400000002, “Population”: 66731, “SWBoundLatitude”: 32.966332, “SWBoungLongitude”: -80.31687190000001, “State”: “SC”, “TotalWages”: 998665611.0, “WaterArea”: 0.16, “Wealthy”: 14965.542416568012, “Zipcode”: “29483”, “ZipcodeType”: “Standard”}```
